name: To The Top! (spatel30)
description:
Controls:

W A S D - Move player

Sprint - Hold Shift 

Slide - Hold Shift then press Left Ctrl. 

To slide and sprint directly after - Press Left Ctrl then immediately press Shift.

Double Jump - Press spacebar twice quickly.

How to wall run - when you are near a wall you can run on, sprint towards the wall with the camera parallel to the wall, you will wall run, look where you want to go to jump in that direction or even chain wall run.

**Make sure the player is looking parallelly to the wall to wall run, otherwise you will wall climb instead, and lose a few extra seconds!

Wall Climb - Look directly towards the wall to wall climb.

M - Pause Game.

Future Additions: Planning to add new environment, level system, sound design, and possible add a shooting component to the game!

Attributions:

Background music: https://www.free-stock-music.com/parkour-introvert.html

Mannequin Character: https://www.mixamo.com/#/?page=1&query=ybot&type=Character

Game Font: https://www.dafont.com/playfulist.font
